column5: This makes me crazy, ran the pup tonight near the house and was greeted with THIS!!!!!!   Drives me Crazy!!!!!! country roads/ dumps  On a better note, a shot for the hunting guys,  pup pointing a woodcock
That is frustrating for sure!! I also have a GSP... love the point!!!!
bloody shame the way some people treat our planet I'd like to take that and dump it on their front lawn.

Slobs like this are lazy....Open each bag and look for an address or identification on an envelope etc. In all likelihood you will find one. Then just take it back to them and throw it on their front lawn....I'm sure it just fell off the truck by mistake   ....They might like that you returned it to them.......or not
